name: Antandre-D
flavor: One of the Twelve lives on in your hand.

name: Chilonis-A
flavor: Surrender is not an option.

name: Conviction II
flavor: Executor-issued sidearm for loyal supporters of the New Monarchy.

name: Crow's Eye
flavor: I see many things. Hear more. Judge all." —Variks

name: Dreg's Promise
flavor: "I am a marvel with ten thousand arms."

name: Havoc Pigeon
flavor: Who knew such a tiny thing could cause so much trouble?

name: Hawkwood-A
flavor: Quick on the draw, the Häkke Hawkwood-A is your all-purpose escape plan.

name: Ironwreath-D
flavor: A versatile sidearm, forged by Häkke for the Lords of the Iron Banner.

name: JabberHäkke-D
flavor: Beware, my gun!

name: Lamorak-A
flavor: What you want, you will have.

name: Llefelys-D
flavor: You don't have a problem. You have solutions.

name: Penthesilea-C
flavor: Seek out battle wherever it may be.

name: Pryderi-D
flavor: Long will the poets sing of your deeds.

name: Queen's Choice
flavor: Presented to Her Majesty Mara Sov by her loving subjects.

name: Rustam-D
flavor: Your labors for the City will not be forgotten.

name: Sagramore-A
flavor: For the warrior who is desirous of victory.

name: Thalestris-C
flavor: Rule the battlefield with the quick-fire Häkke Thalestris-C.

name: Vesosis-C
flavor: This war is long, but it can't last forever.

name: Vestian Dynasty
flavor: A Reef scout hunts for years—fighting piracy and ancient traps—to crack one cache and claim the weapons within.

name: Vortigern-C
flavor: Forge your dynasty.

name: Trespasser
flavor: "You are not welcome." —Unknown "I beg to differ." —Shiro-4

name: The Binding Blaze
flavor: Forged in honor of Perun, she whose fire lit the Iron Banner's path.

name: ZEAL VECTOR~
flavor: Pryderi-D: Long will ~replicate replicate replicate replicate replicate rep

name: Anton's Rule
flavor: Don't include it unless you intend to use it.

name: Impeacher V
flavor: Executor-issued sidearm for loyal supporters of the New Monarchy.

name: Teacup Tempest
flavor: Deadlier than it seems.

name: The Wormwood
flavor: A personal firearm, named and sanctified by the Future War Cult's leaders.
